title: [1.7.10-1.6.4][Eggy Goodness——蛋的精华]—让鸡蛋更有卵用！
author: 椎名雪穗
txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱无名灬颂 于 2016-5-21 21:59 编辑 





1.png (320.81 KB, 下载次数: 252)

下载附件

2015-6-30 20:16 上传





很久很久以前，当Minecraft刚诞生的时候，有鸡，不知道是谁家的鸡，这些鸡会下卵，然而并没有什么卵用，无论怎么尝试并没有一个人能吃到熟卵或品尝到奶黄色的精华。

那些痛苦的日子将一去不复返！

利用我们先进的鸡改良技术，我们可以把没什么卵用的鸡的基因改良成会下可食用卵的鸡。

这些卵可以煎，可以软煮硬煮甚至是打碎在碗里炒！它们也可以用来烹饪！它们可以用来制作美味的蛋糕和馅饼，你也可以制作鸡蛋三明治甚至是用牛奶和糖制作一份蛋奶酒！

这些卵可以镶嵌在黄金与宝石中来制作法贝热彩蛋法贝热，俄国传奇珠宝匠http://baike.baidu.com/link?url=-GPT-go6L6sw32esUxNqFnyVxYO4aTkcE6IgVywwu-2bfVAozsM7MZ0PyMuI2iYZY5-CSil7ZS-JqD6E2TITeSm8ibjmYEltfIjEW93n2aXZFmQdTn17jpqgCCzxHNpKwE85anzYq6Hq-IoTev1Y_a尽管它们看起来十分美丽，它们还是可以像平常的卵一样丢来丢去，也许会从卵堆里钻出一只小金鸡！

你可以在一个方块上摁左键剥掉或者打烂各种各样卵的卵壳，卵壳会变成很好的肥料，金蛋壳最终会使你变得肮脏的富有！


以下是本无节操新人的介绍hhhh

1.6.4与1.7.2
 




2015-06-30_13.13.54.png (114.68 KB, 下载次数: 254)

下载附件

2015-6-30 20:49 上传





1.6.4与1.7.2并没有多大改动，只是增加了一个鸡蛋烹煮出的煎蛋罢了，作者主要着重发展在1.7.10




2015-06-30_13.14.06.png (119.64 KB, 下载次数: 251)

下载附件

2015-6-30 20:49 上传





食用后回复2点饱食度


1.7.10





2015-06-30_16.18.17.png (95.46 KB, 下载次数: 255)

下载附件

2015-6-30 20:51 上传





1.7.10的更新便是丰富多彩了，增加了带有蛋清的生鸡蛋与带有蛋清的双黄蛋，以上这两种蛋都是砸鸡蛋砸出来的，再说一遍要多用左键左键！修改了蛋糕的合成配方，原来蛋糕的合成中间是原版的鸡蛋，现在改成了mod中的生鸡蛋。
还有很多食物我都懒的说了...关于饱食度方面实在是懒得测试，合成的话建议多看NEI或G键合成表，我已进行了渣汉化，另外如果有同学知道黄金羽毛的用途的话请务必告诉我！！貌似黄金羽毛是杀金鸡得到的...金鸡的话是用金蛋以及另外两种蛋右键砸的！记住哟！




2015-07-02_14.00.16.png (332.55 KB, 下载次数: 224)

下载附件

2015-7-2 14:34 上传





真小金鸡...不会长大的鸡...而且楼主看了合成表才知道原来金蛋是不可以合成的...

更新日记【英文】

Version 1.3, July 18 2014 - New Recipes, Double Yolk, Golden Chickens, Golden Eggs, Filthy Rich Chicken Farmers




Changed the Scrambled Egg textureAdded Egg SandwichAdded EggnogAdded Diamond and Emerald Fabergé EggThere's a small chance of Double-Yolk eggs when you break an egg.Throwing a Diamond or Emerald Fabergé egg has a small chance of a Golden Chicken to hatchKilling a Golden Chicken sometimes drops a Golden FeatherGolden Chickens lay Golden EggsGolden Eggs and Diamond/Emerald Fabergé Eggs give a little bit of Gold Dust when peeled or cracked on a block.9 Gold Dust for a Gold IngotFor the truly wealthy: You can cook with Golden and Fabergé Eggs.BUGFIX: Opacity removed from Raw Eggs
Version 1.2, July 16 2014 - Client/Server SMP support, Vanilla Recipe Changes, Config, Bugfixes and more (1.7.10 only!) 


WARNING: If you are updating, your Eggy Goodness Eggs will be removed from the world. (Sorry)Client / Server SMP support! The mod will be universal from now on.Cake and Pumpkin Pie are now made with Raw Egg.Configuration file with option to toggle overwriting of vanilla Cake and Pumpkin Pie recipes.In-Game Mod Configuration GUIMod items now adhere to more logical max stacksizes.Eggy Goodness Creative TabVarious internal framework changes. Logfile support, Vanilla recipe removal, Configuration file support etc.BUGFIX: Items don't duplicate anymore when you break or peel an egg but have no inventory space.BUGFIX: Reorganized the mod internally. Items now register under the correct name.

Version 1.1, July 1 2014 - New breaking/peeling mechanic. Fried, soft- and hard-boiled and scrambled eggs! (1.7.x only!)



Break or peel an egg by left clicking on a block with it.The resulting raw egg can be eaten. You also get the shell in the form of bonemeal.The raw egg can be cooked in a furnace to become a fried egg.Putting a whole egg in a furnace now gives you an unpeeled soft boiled egg.Putting an unpeeled soft boiled egg in a furnace gives you an unpeeled hard boiled egg.Unpeeled eggs can be peeled by left clicking with them on a block to break the shell.Combining a raw egg with a bowl gives you raw scrambled egg. Which you can eat directly or...Raw scrambled egg in a furnace makes scrambled eggs.Differently processed eggs satisfy your hunger in different ways. Some also saturate you more then others.Wolves and dogs like processed eggs too!

Version 1.0 - Baked Eggs
This was the initial release where you can simply place an egg in a furnace to get a baked egg.

【英文】故障排除/冲突
（大致意思就是ID冲突的话请去config里修改ID，ID可以是4097到32000）

When running EggyGoodness 1.0 on Minecraft 1.6.4: When your Minecraft crashes on startup or you get error messages about conflicting ID's, please open the EggyGoodness.cfg file in the config folder of your Minecraft installation and change the number inside it to a free number. Just make a number up if you don't know which ones are free and see if it works now. If not, rinse and repeat. You can pick any number from 4097 to 32000.
